std_inline.citation:
'''Marriage''': "eGGSA Marriage Registers, Fredrik Willem Carel Emil Gildermeester"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Kruisvallei, . marriage register, 1843-1923, entry no 6. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G43 5/1. Transcribed by Lorraine Beechey, from photographs taken at the NGK Archives, by Keith Meintjes - by permission of the NGK Archives
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchMarriages.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Groom with meester anywhere in the surname with willem anywhere in the first name, in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Fredrik Willem Carel Emil Gildermeester marriage to Maria Aletta van der Merwe on 26 Oct 1857.

std_narrative.citation:
Fredrik married Maria Aletta van der Merwe on 26 October 1857. '''Marriage''': "eGGSA Marriage Registers, Fredrik Willem Carel Emil Gildermeester"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Kruisvallei, . marriage register, 1843-1923, entry no 6. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G43 5/1. Transcribed by Lorraine Beechey, from photographs taken at the NGK Archives, by Keith Meintjes - by permission of the NGK Archives
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchMarriages.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Groom with meester anywhere in the surname with willem anywhere in the first name, in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
